name: Aurore Cassel
description: A French netrunner, Aurore Cassel and her twin brotherAymerichave worked for various high-profile clients inFranceand WesternEuropeunder their collective pseudonym "Skylight". At an indeterminate time they were hired byMilitechto reactivate the secretiveProject Cynosure, with the goal of capturing and harnessing powerfulAIsfrom beyond theBlackwall. They also did various jobs for the criminal underworld of France and Western Europe, although such work was not without consequences--Aurore ended up in a stint atParis's high-security La Sant√© Prison for five years, and ultimately had a bounty...
